MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra knew lowering Paros Island|Paros's Nation Power would give Naxos Island|Naxos an advantage in the war, one Myrrine and the people of Naxos desperately needed.'

General_Description: '''Going Down''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra sought to undermine the strength of [[Paros Island|Paros]] to aid her [[Myrrine|mother]] in her war.
Section_Dialogue: There was no spoken dialogue for this memory.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra lowered the strength of Paros as a nation, which would force them into a reckless strike against Naxos.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
